section.title: Benefits of Extensions
section.para:
API extensions provide several key benefits:
a stable core API with support for innovation
a method of adding new features quickly and in a backward-compatible manner
a method of supporting the capabilities of different backends
a method of ensuring compatibility between different kinds of OpenStack deployments
a method of allowing vendors to differentiate their products with niche features
a method of testing new features before they become part of the core API

section.title: Ways to Use Extensions
section.para: To discover which extensions are available, issue a &GET; to /extensions.
To use a specific extension, issue a &GET; to /extensions/{EXT-ALIAS}.
To prevent conflicts between extensions, use aliases and namespaces to identify each extension's vendor.
To move an extension into the core API, work within OpenStack to have it promoted.
